posts.title: Does anyone know how to create child component?
posts.message: Hi, how can I show my custom button in my app?

posts.title: Error while updating state
posts.message: I have a list of people like this: [{id: 1, name: 'Jekyll'}, {id: 2, name: 'Hyde'}, ...] and I am adding new record by this.state.people.push({id: 3, name: 'Jack Kerouac'}) but nothing happens.
